languages.text: {n}Мир блекнет, и чувства сразу же сосредотачиваются на кончике вашего языка. "Ли" — язык нежно щекочет небо, и звуки непривычно мягко скользят по вашему горлу, согревая его подобно глотку свежего рекафа. "Лэ" — язык ударяется о передние зубы, и воздух едва слышно вырывается из груди, напоминая шелест ветра в кронах деревьев. "Тан" — кончик языка вновь ударяется о небо, и легкая вибрация расходится по телу, отчего по спине пробегают мурашки.{/n}

{n}The world around you fades and your perception instantly narrows, coming to a single point of focus on the tip of your tongue. "Li" — your tongue delicately tickles the roof of your mouth, and the sound slips along your throat with incredible silkiness, warming as it goes like a sip of fresh recaf. "Lae" — the tip of your tongue touches the same place again and air softly rushes from your chest, the sound like the susurration of leaves as the wind weaves through a forest canopy. "Than" — your tongue taps your front teeth and a gentle vibration spreads through your body, sending a shiver along your spine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mundo se desvanece a tu alrededor y tu percepción se agudiza al instante, centrándose únicamente en la punta de tu lengua. «Li»; tu lengua roza delicadamente el paladar, y el sonido se desliza por tu garganta con una fluidez increíble, volviéndose más cálido al pasar, como un sorbo de café recién hecho. «Lae»; la punta de tu lengua vuelve a tocar el mismo sitio y el aire brota con suavidad desde tu pecho, sonando como el susurro de las hojas de los árboles mecidas por el viento. «Than»; tu lengua presiona contra tus dientes, una tenue vibración se propaga por todo tu cuerpo y un escalofrío te recorre la espina dorsal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world around you fades and your perception instantly narrows, coming to a single point of focus on the tip of your tongue. languages.text: {n}周囲の世界がぼやけ、知覚は瞬時に狭まり、舌先の一点に集中する。「リ」―舌が口蓋をくすぐり、絹のような滑らかさで音が喉から流れ出て、淹れたての模造コーヒーを飲んだかのように温めていく。「ラエ」―舌先がまた同じ場所に触れ、空気が胸から優しく流れ、柔らかい風が森の木々を通り葉を揺らすかのような音を発した。「タン」―舌が前歯に触れ、優しい振動が身体中をかけめぐり、背筋にぞくぞくとした感覚が流れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world around you fades and your perception instantly narrows, coming to a single point of focus on the tip of your tongue. "Li" — your tongue delicately tickles the roof of your mouth, and the sound slips along your throat with incredible silkiness, warming as it goes like a sip of fresh recaf. "Lae" — the tip of your tongue touches the same place again and air softly rushes from your chest, the sound like the susurration of leaves as the wind weaves through a forest canopy. "Than" — your tongue taps your front teeth and a gentle vibration spreads through your body, sending a shiver along your spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}周囲の世界がぼやけ、知覚は瞬時に狭まり、舌先の一点に集中する。「リ」―舌が口蓋をくすぐり、絹のような滑らかさで音が喉から流れ出て、淹れたての模造コーヒーを飲んだかのように温めていく。「ラエ」―舌先がまた同じ場所に触れ、空気が胸から優しく流れ、柔らかい風が森の木々を通り葉を揺らすかのような音を発した。「タン」―舌が前歯に触れ、優しい振動が身体中をかけめぐり、背筋にぞくぞくとした感覚が流れた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你感到周围的世界变得模糊，你的意识迅速收拢集中在舌尖的一个点上。“莉——”你的舌头轻巧地拂过上颚，让音节顺滑如丝地流入喉咙，仿佛咽下了一口新鲜的雷卡咖啡。“莱——”你的舌头再次拂过同一个位置，空气从你的胸腔中柔和地呼出，像是微风穿过树林时的窸窣呢喃。“赞——”你的舌尖紧贴牙列，细微的震颤传遍你的全身，沿着脊柱激起一阵战栗。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world around you fades and your perception instantly narrows, coming to a single point of focus on the tip of your tongue. "Li" — your tongue delicately tickles the roof of your mouth, and the sound slips along your throat with incredible silkiness, warming as it goes like a sip of fresh recaf. "Lae" — the tip of your tongue touches the same place again and air softly rushes from your chest, the sound like the susurration of leaves as the wind weaves through a forest canopy. "Than" — your tongue taps your front teeth and a gentle vibration spreads through your body, sending a shiver along your spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你感到周围的世界变得模糊，你的意识迅速收拢集中在舌尖的一个点上。“莉——”你的舌头轻巧地拂过上颚，让音节顺滑如丝地流入喉咙，仿佛咽下了一口新鲜的雷卡咖啡。“莱——”你的舌头再次拂过同一个位置，空气从你的胸腔中柔和地呼出，像是微风穿过树林时的窸窣呢喃。“赞——”你的舌尖紧贴牙列，细微的震颤传遍你的全身，沿着脊柱激起一阵战栗。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le monde s'estompe autour de vous et vos sens se focalisent en un seul point sur le bout de votre langue. « Li » : votre langue vient délicatement chatouiller votre palais tandis que le son se répand dans votre gorge avec une incroyable douceur, la réchauffant au fur et à mesure comme après une gorgée de recaff. « Lae » : le bout de votre langue touche à nouveau le même endroit et l'air s'échappe doucement de vos poumons, dans un son évoquant le murmure des feuilles lorsque le vent souffle sur la canopée d'une forêt. « Than » : votre langue entre en contact avec vos incisives et une légère vibration se propage dans tout votre corps, provoquant un frisson le long de votre colonne vertébrale.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world around you fades and your perception instantly narrows, coming to a single point of focus on the tip of your tongue. "Li" — your tongue delicately tickles the roof of your mouth, and the sound slips along your throat with incredible silkiness, warming as it goes like a sip of fresh recaf. "Lae" — the tip of your tongue touches the same place again and air softly rushes from your chest, the sound like the susurration of leaves as the wind weaves through a forest canopy. "Than" — your tongue taps your front teeth and a gentle vibration spreads through your body, sending a shiver along your spine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Welt um dich herum verblasst und deine Wahrnehmung engt sich schlagartig ein, konzentriert sich auf einen einzigen messerscharfen Punkt an der Spitze deiner Zunge. "Li" — deine Zunge kitzelt zart deinen Gaumen, und das Geräusch gleitet unvorstellbar glatt deine Kehle entlang, wärmt sie wie ein Schluck frischer Rekaf. "Le" — deine Zungenspitze berührt dieselbe Stelle erneut und Luft strömt sanft aus deiner Brust empor. Das Geräusch gleich dem Rauschen der Blätter, wenn der Wind sich einen Weg durch das Dach des Waldes bahnt. "Ath" — deine Zunge tippt gegen deine Schneidezähne und eine sanfte Vibration breitet sich in deinem Körper aus und jagt ein Kribbeln dein Rückgrat hinunter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world around you fades and your perception instantly narrows, coming to a single point of focus on the tip of your tongue. "Li" — your tongue delicately tickles the roof of your mouth, and the sound slips along your throat with incredible silkiness, warming as it goes like a sip of fresh recaf. "Lae" — the tip of your tongue touches the same place again and air softly rushes from your chest, the sound like the susurration of leaves as the wind weaves through a forest canopy. "Than" — your tongue taps your front teeth and a gentle vibration spreads through your body, sending a shiver along your spine.{/n}

"Li" — deine Zunge kitzelt zart deinen Gaumen, und das Geräusch gleitet unvorstellbar glatt deine Kehle entlang, wärmt sie wie ein Schluck frischer Rekaf. languages.text: {n}Etrafındaki dünya soluyor, algıların anında daralarak tüm odağını dilinin ucunda yoğunlaştırıyor. "Li". Dilin, damağını narince gıdıklıyor. Ses, boğazından inanılmaz bir ipeksilikle akıp gidiyor, taze bir kahfe gibi içini ısıtıyor. "Lae". Dilinin ucu, yeniden aynı noktaya dokunuyor. Bir nefes, göğsünden yavaşça geçerek ormanda esen rüzgârın yapraklara değdiğindeki hışırtısını andıran bir ses çıkarıyor. "Than". Dilin, ön dişlerine dokunuyor. Hafif bir titreşim, bedenine yayılarak omurgana bir ürperti gönderiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world around you fades and your perception instantly narrows, coming to a single point of focus on the tip of your tongue. "Li" — your tongue delicately tickles the roof of your mouth, and the sound slips along your throat with incredible silkiness, warming as it goes like a sip of fresh recaf. "Lae" — the tip of your tongue touches the same place again and air softly rushes from your chest, the sound like the susurration of leaves as the wind weaves through a forest canopy. "Than" — your tongue taps your front teeth and a gentle vibration spreads through your body, sending a shiver along your spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Etrafındaki dünya soluyor ve algıların anında daralarak tüm odağını dilinin ucunda yoğunlaştırıyor. "Li". Dilin, damağını narince gıdıklıyor. Ses, boğazından inanılmaz bir ipeksilikle akıp gidiyor, taze bir kahfe gibi içini ısıtıyor. "Lae". Dilinin ucu yeniden aynı noktaya dokunuyor ve bir nefes göğsünden yumuşakça geçerek ormanda esen rüzgârın yapraklara değdiğindeki hışırtısı gibi bir ses çıkarıyor. "Than". Dilin, ön dişlerine dokunuyor ve hafif bir titreşim bedenine yayılarak omurgana bir ürperti gönderiyor.{/n}
